about_the_game:
Your favorite card game is now animated!

Features:

Big 2 / Pusoy Dos! - Easy and fun strategy card game

Play Together! - Real time competition with family and friends

Dodgeball! - Throw and dodge for offense and defense

Martial Arts! - Discover cultures around the world, from kung fu to jiu jitsu

Anime! - Artistic blend of Japanese manga with Americana comic strips

Arcade! - Wins new Athletes, Spirit Pets, Boosters, and Coins

Events! - Exciting challenges give free Gems, Coins, and Tokens

Win Big! - Climb leaderboards for tons of rewards

Big 2, known by many names worldwide, is universally beloved. Referred to as 大老二 in China , 锄大弟 in Hong Kong, Pusoy Dos in Philippines, Daifugō(大富豪) in Japan, President in Europe, Thirteen in Vietnam, and Capsa in Indonesia.

Follow us @DodgeballDojo on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, X, and YouTube!

A persistent network connection is required to play (network fees may apply).

Last but not least, thank you to our family and friends who supported us as we worked those long hours.

name: Dodgeball Dojo™ - Big 2 anime

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10/11
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play competitive card games inspired by Big 2 / pusoy dos with friends and family! Collect cool anime and manga Spirit Pets, and watch Athletes dodge, duck, dip, dive, and dodge!
supported_languages: English, Indonesian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
